title: Mailin It! Trailer
description:
Our goal with Mailin’ It! is to help you better understand the vital, yet often overlooked, role the U.S. Postal Service plays in keeping us connected. To do that, we’ll speak with experts about the latest and greatest going on at the U.S. Postal Service. We’ll also delve into the Postal Service’s fascinating history and its impact on American life today.

Some episodes will take a fun look at the Postal Service’s history, which dates back before the American Revolution. In other episodes, we’ll talk about Postal Service innovations past and present.

We’ll also take you behind the scenes to hear from key leaders, decision makers and other members of the USPS community who are charting a new course for the Postal Service.

Join us for Mailin’ It!
author: mediacenter@usps.gov (United States Postal Service)

itunes:author: United States Postal Service
itunes:summary: Welcome to the U.S. Postal Service's official podcast. Meet Yasmine Di Giulio and Dale Parsan as they describe what this podcast series is all about.
